silhouette.shapes
Class ImageShape

  |

                    |
                    +--silhouette.shapes.ImageShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
SilShape
public class ImageShape
extends BoxShape

A gif, jpeg, or bitmap image that is drawn on the screen. In addition to the normal properties of a Silhouette BoxShape, an ImageShape also has the following property:

  1. Image: The image to be displayed on the screen. The image can be created from a URL, from a filename, or from an java.awt.Image object.

Field Summary
static int defaultSize
          The default size for the image that is returned if a valid width cannot be determined.

Method Detail

initializeImage

protected void initializeImage()
Initialize the width and height to defaultSize so that if the user does not provide a width and height, the width and height will be derived from the image's natural width and height

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
Draws the image on the screen. This method should never be called directly by an application. To get an image to appear on the screen, either add it to a Silhouette canvas or to a composite shape that has been added to a Silhouette canvas.
